title: Kong: Skull Island promises epic scale, huge action in this IMAX featurette | hollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Kong: Skull Island promises epic scale, huge action in this IMAX featurette 
Tom Hiddleston, Brie Larson and Samuel L Jackson take us behind the scenes of Kong: Skull Island. hollywood Updated: Feb 18, 2017 10:13 IST AFP Kong: Skull Island has been scheduled for a March 10 release. 
Tom Hiddleston, Brie Larson and Samuel L Jackson take us behind the scenes of Kong: Skull Island, and its epic scale in a new IMAX featurette. 
The film is a reimagining of the King Kong story set in the Godzilla universe. In it, a crew of explorers, scientists, and soldiers are sent onto a remote island to track the beasts that lurk within Skull Island. 
Actors Tom Hiddleston, Brie Larson, Samuel L. Jackson and director Jordan Vogt-Roberts are among those appearing in the featurette, with Hiddleston calling the movie an “immersive spectacle” and Vogt-Roberts talking it up as “a different world where things are beautiful and terrifying all at the same time.” Read more
